question: Plant growth is affected by environmental factors such as gravity. If a seed is allowed to sprout and grow while it is turned sideways, which will most likely occur?
candidate_answers: (A) roots will grow downward, stems will grow downward (B) roots will grow downward, stems will grow upward (C) roots will grow upward, stems will grow downward (D) roots will grow upward, stems will grow upward
answer: roots will grow downward, stems will grow upward
label: B
